nodes.text: A bayonet was a sharp blade that could be mounted on the end of a blaster rifle or other long-barreled rifle. This allowed the wielder to use the rifle in close combat as a spear-like melee weapon. A bayonet detached from a rifle could be used as a simple knife. The vibrobayonet was an enhanced version of this weapon.
The Rodian hunter Harno used such a weapon, as did the bounty hunter Mist. Other users included Republic troopers of the Old Republic, Trandoshan Bounty Hunters, and members of Kota's Militia.
In a few notable instances, Rebel commanders have ordered their troops to "fix bayonets!" more so that their men would go down with a fight than any real effect the bayonets would have on the enemy.
